channel.title: Good movies?
channel.description:
Any good suspense/thriller movies you guys recommend watching?
Movies like:
Black swan Catfish
etc. :) thanks in advance

item.title: Good movies?
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:39, topic:476934”][quote author=-Nothing link=topic=595099.msg4194463#msg4194463 date=1357314422]

Requiem for a Dream. It’s a very well done and hard-hitting film. This is what a good movie is.

P.S. If you get emotionally invested (hard not to in a good movie), then you probably won’t even think about doing drugs until you’re 30. Also, I wouldn’t watch this if you are easily upset or get depressed easily. Watch it until the end and you’ll see what I mean.

Pretty stupid line there. Usually when people watch movies they watch it to the end, nobody stops watching at middle of the movie and be like ‘okay now ive seen it.’.
[/quote]

Nah, I’ve seen people walk out of movie theaters because they couldn’t understand a movie, or it was too slow, or too gory, or they didn’t like the acting, etc.[/quote]
Really? It’s stupid to judge movie if you don’t watch it completely.

Read full topic

Requiem for a Dream. It’s a very well done and hard-hitting film. This is what a good movie is.

P.S. If you get emotionally invested (hard not to in a good movie), then you probably won’t even think about doing drugs until you’re 30. Also, I wouldn’t watch this if you are easily upset or get depressed easily. Watch it until the end and you’ll see what I mean.
[/quote]
Pretty stupid line there. Usually when people watch movies they watch it to the end, nobody stops watching at middle of the movie and be like ‘okay now ive seen it.’.[/quote]

Nah, I’ve seen people walk out of movie theaters because they couldn’t understand a movie, or it was too slow, or too gory, or they didn’t like the acting, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Good movies?
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:25, topic:476934”][quote author=Soulcist link=topic=595099.msg4193739#msg4193739 date=1357201292]

Yes, watched The Hobbit this morning and thought it was quite amazing! I’m a bit confused with it though, I never bothered watching The Lord of the Rings, and I noticed there was SOME correlation with the two, someone want to explain that?

you need to watch lord of the rings now, because hobbit is the prequel.

great series fyi

I should have figured…
[/quote]

i can explain it to you, if you really want me to. But it’ll spoil watching all 3 movies.[/quote]
I’ll find the time to watch them all lol’d.

Read full topic
